byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Angela Macropoulos, Benjamin Mueller, Noah Remnick and Eli Rosenberg, and research by Doris Burke.
byline.original: By AL BAKER and J. DAVID GOODMAN

abstract: New York City police say police officer fatally shot Miguel Espinal after car chase begun in Bronx that ended in foot pursuit in wooded area of Yonkers; investigation is under way about circumstances of shooting.
lead_paragraph: The chase, which ended in Miguel Espinal’s death, led to the shutdown of the Saw Mill River Parkway in Yonkers, just north of the Bronx border.

headline.main: New York Police Officer Fatally Shoots Unarmed Man After Chase Into Westchester
headline.print_headline: City Officer Fatally Shoots Unarmed Man After Chase Into Westchester

snippet: The chase, which ended in Miguel Espinal’s death, led to the shutdown of the Saw Mill River Parkway in Yonkers, just north of the Bronx border.
